blogPost.excerpt: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
blogPost.body: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
blogPost.title: Ideas for dev - New ideas for your next project
blogPost.author: Saeed Moqadam

localize.description: 对我来说，作为一名开发者，找到一个有趣的想法一直是个挑战。如果你还停留在想法阶段，请订阅IdeasFor.dev通讯，每周都能在你的收件箱中收到项目想法。
localize.tagline: 为您的下一个项目提供新思路

localize.description: 對我來說，作爲一名開發者，找到一個有趣的想法一直是個挑戰。如果你還停留在想法階段，請訂閱IdeasFor.dev通訊，每週都能在你的收件箱中收到項目想法。
localize.tagline: 爲您的下一個項目提供新思路

previous.excerpt: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
previous.title: Check - Embed payroll in your product

localize.description: Check是一个薪资即服务的API，让您可以将薪资直接嵌入到您的产品中。我们为全功能的工资单提供了所有的构建模块，包括一个强大的API、模块化的白标上岗组件和一个合作伙伴仪表板。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品中嵌入工资单

localize.description: Check是一個薪資即服務的API，讓您可以將薪資直接嵌入到您的產品中。我們爲全功能的工資單提供了所有的構建模塊，包括一個強大的API、模塊化的白標上崗組件和一個合作伙伴儀表板。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品中嵌入工資單

next.excerpt: Career Emails is a collection of great email templates that cover a number of networking situations, including how to ask an industry leader for advice, cold email alumni, follow up with someone, write effective LinkedIn connection request notes, and more!
next.title: Networking Emails - 100+ proven email templates to help your career in 2021

localize.description: 职场邮件》是一套优秀的邮件模板，涵盖了多种人脉关系的情况，包括如何向行业领导请教、给校友发冷邮件、与人跟进、写有效的LinkedIn连接请求说明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的邮件模板，为你的2021年事业发展助力

localize.description: 職場郵件》是一套優秀的郵件模板，涵蓋了多種人脈關係的情況，包括如何向行業領導請教、給校友發冷郵件、與人跟進、寫有效的LinkedIn連接請求說明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的郵件模板，爲你的2021年事業發展助力
